FAQ.question: Why is Panchayat Tax Receipt needed?
FAQ.answer: It confirms payment of rural property taxes and ensures no outstanding dues.

FAQ.question: Is the tax receipt required for selling rural property?
FAQ.answer: Yes. Buyers check it to verify tax compliance before purchase.

FAQ.question: Can I download old tax receipts?
FAQ.answer: Yes. If available digitally in Panchayat systems, past receipts can be downloaded.
